name: fullscreenpokemon
description: A free HTML5 remake of the original Pokemon, expanded for modern browsing.

credits: Full Screen Pokemon was made possible first and foremost by Nintendo, who originally created Pokemon and has since maintained the series.
It would also not have been possible without the dedicated efforts of the Pokemon fan community over the past two decades, in particular Bulbapedia.
explanation: Full Screen Pokemon is a free HTML5 remake of Nintendo's original Pokemon.
It includes the original two generations, a random map generator, a <!-- social --> level editor, and over a dozen custom mods.
sections.legal: Pokemon and all associated games and media are property of Nintendo and/or Nintendo of America Inc., and are protected by United States and international copyright, trademark and other intellectual property laws.
